meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>thing</kanji>s that are <kanji>weave</kanji>d are, essentially, just <vocabulary>textile</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>fabric</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The readings are the kun'yomi readings. With 織 you can pull the reading from 織る. With 物 you've probably seen it enough to know that it's often もの and not ぶつ. Just think of a piece of <vocabulary>cloth</vocabulary> that is <reading>mono</reading>chrome.
